analyzed: d+hi ra ya bi ra ya shan+d+ra ya dan+na ya kan+d+ra ya na tha ya b+ha dru ya ru dren+d+ra : di b+hirde ba sam

analyzed: g+his+sa da pu dzi ta ya pra me ya pra b+ha ba ya shan+tat+ma ne bsku bispat+ta gam+b+hi ra d+hi ra swa ra

analyzed: ya sa ma yot+ta ma ya pra me ya ya  pra pra sa swa nu\u0fbek+ta ya ya bitsh+tshhin+na pra pra pa pro

analyzed: dang smad pas mtho dma' med thugs zag pa kun dang skye rgyun kun bcad de la rnam pa kun tu lus ngag yid
translated: Without high or low thoughts due to praise or blame, having cut off all defilements and all continuity of birth, I pay homage with my body, speech, and mind

original: da ra brta ham pe sha dza la ba nad+hu_d+hi dza dza ka ya shri ya tsha tu tsha mi ka ka zangs mdog lto 'khyil ngang pa'i dbang ltar dra bas 'brel ba'i phyag zhabs pad ldan bdag nyid sku yi dpal dang mdzes pas🔽sho b+ha ba hatre sbi ri na ya rdza g+ha ya sap+tot+sa dang+ga ya ko sha sbi ta lak+sha gu ca ya bistir+na

translated: 1. The feet and hands are connected by a web, like a goose or a chakra-bird, and the body is endowed with the glory and beauty of the lotus.🔽2. The calves are like the antelope of the gods, the thighs are like the coiled trunk of an elephant, and the secret organ is concealed in a sheath.

original: gser gyi mchod sdong mdzes pa 'phrog mdzad brtan pa'i byin pa e khe ya 'dra sku yi bdun mtho gsang ba'i mtshhan ni sbubs su🔽pi no ra se si ham pu jad+ha ka ya ya su gla tsh+tshha bi ta da nirba kya bar+na ya pi na sbi ra lam+ba

translated: 3. The seven parts of the body are well-proportioned, like the golden victory banner, and the body is well-rounded, like the nyagrodha tree.🔽4. The shoulders are well-developed, like the shoulders of a lion, and the skin is smooth, soft, and unblemished.

original: sdug bsngal nges sgrol grub pa dag pa dang dngos grub mdangs ldan yon gnas rtshod bral kha lo bsgyur ba 'jig rten gsum🔽ya sha ti kirti rti _pra ta na ya dutsh+tshha yi ta ca gi ne puk+ta asam se bi ne nirma da yo pa

translated: endowed with the absence of partiality toward those worthy of offerings, endowed with the role of guiding the three worlds,🔽endowed with vast fame, endowed with the abandonment of faulty explanations, endowed with the reliance on all excellent explanations,🔽endowed with the absence of arrogance, endowed with the role of🔽endowed with the pacification of craving, endowed with the absence of desire, endowed with the absence of pride,

original: zhi ba srid pa'i chu bo skem par mdzad pa ser sna mi mnga' yan lag chos gsung lhun po la sogs ri rgyal las kyang lhag par
analyzed: zhi ba srid pa'i chu bo skem par mdzad pa ser sna mi mnga' yan lag chos gsung lhun po la sogs ri rgyal las kyang lhag par
translated: He is peaceful, drying up the river of existence, not miserly, with the speech of the Dharma, superior even to Meru, the king of mountains, and so forth.

original: tri ra dza d+hi ka s+thir+ya yut+tar+na ba ga d+ha gam+b+hi ra tshit+ta ya pra thi ba da grak+sha ma ya k+shama bi
analyzed: tri ra dza d+hi ka s+thir+ya yut+tar+na ba ga d+ha gam+b+hi ra tshit+ta ya pra thi ba da grak+sha ma ya k+shama bi

original: brtan ldan rgya mtshho gting zab lta bu'i thugs mnga' sa gzhi lta bur bzod mchog ldan zhing bzod pa'i gsung ldan
analyzed: brtan ldan rgya mtshho gting zab lta bu'i thugs mnga' sa gzhi lta bur bzod mchog ldan zhing bzod pa'i gsung ldan
translated: He has a mind as stable and deep as the ocean, supreme patience like the earth, and speech of patience.

original: di ne pu tra da rat+ma tshit+ta pra da na di na cu_rba na mitsh+tshha ya pu ri ta sha ya sha
analyzed: di ne pu tra da rat+ma tshit+ta pra da na di na cu_rba na mitsh+tshha ya pu ri ta sha ya sha
translated: dine-putradaratna-citta-pranadana-dine-carvana-mitshahaya-purita-śaya-ś

analyzed: bu dang chung ma bdag nyid thugs rab sbyin mdzad pas slong ba gzhan gyi 'dod pa bsam pa bzhin du rdzogs mdzad
translated: By giving his own son, wife, and self, he fulfills the wishes of other beggars just as they desire.🔽śvanna-mas-dha-ve

original: shwan+na mas _d+ha _we//__/_kho   kha ra //__//
analyzed: shwan+na mas _d+ha _we//__/_kho   kha ra //__//

original: rtag tu legs pa mdzad la phyag 'tshhal lo//_/_//__//
analyzed: rtag tu legs pa mdzad la phyag 'tshhal lo//_/_//__//
translated: I pay homage to the one who always acts well.

original: rtag tu legs pa mdzad la phyag 'tshhal lo//__//
analyzed: rtag tu legs pa mdzad la phyag 'tshhal lo//__//
translated: I pay homage to the one who always acts well.🔽Prabhikāsitikṛpāpalāśa-makuṭacchikāṃ śilanalasamasamadhi-puru

original: pra bi ka si ta kr-i pa pa la sham klu ma katsh+tshi kam shi la na la sa ma d+hi spu ra \u0f7a sa ram d+h+ya
analyzed: pra bi ka si ta kr-i pa pa la sham klu ma katsh+tshi kam shi la na la sa ma d+hi spu ra \u0f7a sa ram d+h+ya
translated: Saramudhy

original: rab tu rnam rgyas brtshe ba'i mdangs ldan bzod pa'i lte ba tshhul khrims sdong bu ting 'dzin gsal ba'i ge sar
analyzed: rab tu rnam rgyas brtshe ba'i mdangs ldan bzod pa'i lte ba tshhul khrims sdong bu ting 'dzin gsal ba'i ge sar
translated: The essence of patience, the trunk of morality, the clear petals of samadhi,

original: na bo d+h+ya ga kiny+dzalka mat+ma pra b+ha bo d+hi tam kirti gan+d+ha nu shit+tam b+ha maha d+hu bid d+ha si ra
analyzed: na bo d+h+ya ga kiny+dzalka mat+ma pra b+ha bo d+hi tam kirti gan+d+ha nu shit+tam b+ha maha d+hu bid d+ha si ra
translated: Nabodhyagakinkara-matma-prahabodhitam-kirti-gandhanuṣittaṃ-bhama-mahadhūvidhisri

original: bsam gtan byang chub yan lag ze 'bru bdag nyid rab rtogs grags pa'i dri bsung rjes 'brang bung bas legs bzhibs swo
analyzed: bsam gtan byang chub yan lag ze 'bru bdag nyid rab rtogs grags pa'i dri bsung rjes 'brang bung bas legs bzhibs swo
translated: The anthers of the branches of dhyāna and enlightenment, well-drunk by the bees of fame and fragrance,

original: na ba li pi ta sad+harma re rgyut+ta ram bud+d+ha pad+ma swa b+hi_t+ya t+ya cu n+ya ma_p+ta ma ya te na sab+be
analyzed: na ba li pi ta sad+harma re rgyut+ta ram bud+d+ha pad+ma swa b+hi_t+ya t+ya cu n+ya ma_p+ta ma ya te na sab+be
translated: Navāli-pitadharma-rergyutta-raṃ buddhapadmin-svabhittyatyacchunyaṃ-patam-ayatene-sva

original: ra lha yi phreng ser lta bu'i dam chos rdul bzang 'thor ba'i sangs rgyas pad+mar mngon par bstod las bsod nams gang zhig
analyzed: ra lha yi phreng ser lta bu'i dam chos rdul bzang 'thor ba'i sangs rgyas pad+mar mngon par bstod las bsod nams gang zhig
translated: The merit that I have gained by praising the lotus of the Buddha,🔽the excellent dust of the holy Dharma, scattered like a yellow garland of divine flowers,

original: dza nas+san+tu bitsh+tshhan+na du_da da lo ka s+ya tsha s+ya ma ham sarba da sarba tha tsho pa ka ra ya
analyzed: dza nas+san+tu bitsh+tshhan+na du_da da lo ka s+ya tsha s+ya ma ham sarba da sarba tha tsho pa ka ra ya
translated: may that merit🔽cut off the arising of suffering for all beings in all worlds,

original: bdag gi thob des skye bo thams cad sdug bsngal 'byung ba rnam par chad gyur 'jig rten kun tu bdag ni dus dang rnam pa🔽trish+nathu to nu smra tas+sam ka tha ma tra ma pyu ga tasprithama kro tha ba ru pa ba ni shwa ra k+sha
analyzed: bdag gi thob des skye bo thams cad sdug bsngal 'byung ba rnam par chad gyur 'jig rten kun tu bdag ni dus dang rnam pa trish+nathu to nu smra tas+sam ka tha ma tra ma pyu ga tasprithama kro tha ba ru pa ba ni shwa ra k+sha
translated: and may I always be present in all places and times for all beings.🔽May I be seen, heard, remembered, touched, or spoken of,

original: kun du mthong thos rjes su dran dang gtam du brjod dang reg tsham gyis kyang 'gro la phan pa byed par gyur cig gzugs
analyzed: kun du mthong thos rjes su dran dang gtam du brjod dang reg tsham gyis kyang 'gro la phan pa byed par gyur cig gzugs
translated: and may I be a source of benefit to beings through my form,🔽my speech, my mind, and my activities.

original: rgyun chags kyi tshhigs su bcad pas bstod pa/
analyzed: rgyun chags kyi tshhigs su bcad pas bstod pa/
translated: A Praise in Continuous Verses

original: yan+ni_pra d+ha na pri yas+sarba satwa pri ya byang+ga mut+ti shu li natha la pa ra go she sha sha🔽bzang dbang phyug mi zad blo dang gtshor gyur dga' dang sems can thams cad rangs byed ma tshhang med lus rigs ldan rgyu
analyzed: yan+ni_pra d+ha na pri yas+sarba satwa pri ya byang+ga mut+ti shu li natha la pa ra go she sha sha bzang dbang phyug mi zad blo dang gtshor gyur dga' dang sems can thams cad rangs byed ma tshhang med lus rigs ldan rgyu
translated: Yannapi pradhanapriyassarvasattvapriyāṅgamutthitaśūlinā paragoṣeṣaś🔽Bhadrapadādhipatir-akṣayabuddhi-sparśabhūtapriyā sarvasattvotsādanī-anāthadehanikāyavatī

original: s+t+warba bet+ta tsha sug+ma tsh+tshha bi_ra ra taspu swa thu pra tah_tha g+ha ni yo ya si pra hi na ma ya zla
analyzed: s+t+warba bet+ta tsha sug+ma tsh+tshha bi_ra ra taspu swa thu pra tah_tha g+ha ni yo ya si pra hi na ma ya zla

original: rtshal mthar son ma lus bstan bcos don rig zhib cing dngas la nges shing dbyangs nyan thos mchog gsang sngags 'os
analyzed: rtshal mthar son ma lus bstan bcos don rig zhib cing dngas la nges shing dbyangs nyan thos mchog gsang sngags 'os
translated: Vanam-antasaṃprāptā-sarvaśāstrārthavid-vicchādanasudhā-niyata-svarāgrya-mantra-arha

original: ma bi mu khya yuk+ta thi pa si kr-i ta rgyu sha yapu rba dza ti sma ro sa tsha ma b+hutri yi bi
analyzed: ma bi mu khya yuk+ta thi pa si kr-i ta rgyu sha yapu rba dza ti sma ro sa tsha ma b+hutri yi bi
translated: Māvi-mukhyayuktathīpasikṛta-śarīrapurva-jāti-smara-rosatva-mabhūtriyavī

original: grags ldan mi dman rang bzhin 'dod las phyir phyogs rigs shing brtshe ldan lhag bsam ldan zhing sngon gyi skye dran der yang
analyzed: grags ldan mi dman rang bzhin 'dod las phyir phyogs rigs shing brtshe ldan lhag bsam ldan zhing sngon gyi skye dran der yang

original: pra yo go pri yi+is+sa pra yo gatha da tshid+ma da sadz+dza na ma sha yo d+harma nisna smra ti_na
analyzed: pra yo go pri yi+is+sa pra yo gatha da tshid+ma da sadz+dza na ma sha yo d+harma nisna smra ti_na
translated: prayogopariṣṣaṭpraṇidhānasatvamahāyodhadharmanisnayasmarati

original: na sdug dang bral dang mi sdug phrad par nam yang ma gyur rtag tu dam pa'i skye bo la brten chos la gzhol zhing dran ldan sbyin dang shi la klu ma bi_r+ya wang+g+ha na sam yuk+ta sat+tha dza ya n+ye_ny+tsha sam bo d+hi tshan+d+ra na yi spa mya ga pur+ya sam
analyzed: na sdug dang bral dang mi sdug phrad par nam yang ma gyur rtag tu dam pa'i skye bo la brten chos la gzhol zhing dran ldan sbyin dang shi la klu ma bi_r+ya wang+g+ha na sam yuk+ta sat+tha dza ya n+ye_ny+tsha sam bo d+hi tshan+d+ra na yi spa mya ga pur+ya sam

original: ati_budad+ha_b+hat+ta_ra_ka_ga na_na_sto_sa_sa_/ zhes pa sangs rgyas rje btshun la rgyun chags kyi tshhigs su bcad pas bstod pa rdzogs so//
analyzed: ati_budad+ha_b+hat+ta_ra_ka_ga na_na_sto_sa_sa_/ zhes pa sangs rgyas rje btshun la rgyun chags kyi tshhigs su bcad pas bstod pa rdzogs so//
translated: The praise in connected verses to the Lord Buddha is completed.🔽Katthabba-dhanta-ratna-maṅgala-lekha.

original: katatsh+tshhab+hadan+tarat+namamg lenalikhatam/_/_'bab / kyogs kyi btshun pa rin chen bkra shis kyi bris//_//
analyzed: katatsh+tshhab+hadan+tarat+namamg lenalikhatam/_/_'bab / kyogs kyi btshun pa rin chen bkra shis kyi bris//_//

original: de la rgyab /_/_phyi
analyzed: de la rgyab /_/_phyi
translated: There, the auspicious one🔽speaks with a pleasant voice, the beautiful one

original: bas gsung snyan sgrogs/_rnam bkra dag pa'i gyi lo 'dab kyi ya nga ba'i_/
analyzed: bas gsung snyan sgrogs/_rnam bkra dag pa'i gyi lo 'dab kyi ya nga ba'i_/
translated: with a pure leaf-like tongue.

original: de ga nga ba shes pa de la _ba la sa bab kyi_gleng
analyzed: de ga nga ba shes pa de la _ba la sa bab kyi_gleng
translated: The one who knows that,🔽the one who is cool like the center of a lotus,

original: bsil /_pa pad+ma'i lte ba la spyi blugs pa /_de ma byas pa'i
analyzed: bsil /_pa pad+ma'i lte ba la spyi blugs pa /_de ma byas pa'i
translated: the one who is not without the crest-jewel,🔽the one who is not without the auspicious mark,

original: 'bras bzang rtshol ba canami pham bsam dbang po de la 'dud_/
analyzed: 'bras bzang rtshol ba canami pham bsam dbang po de la 'dud_/
translated: the one who is not without the good fruit,🔽the one who is not without the desire to conquer,🔽the one who is not without the power of the mind,🔽I bow to that one.🔽I offer all that is suitable, I confess the heap of misdeeds,

original: chog pa kun 'bul sdig lu lo por bshad pa/_dge mi 'dra khyod la 'khor
analyzed: chog pa kun 'bul sdig lu lo por bshad pa/_dge mi 'dra khyod la 'khor
translated: I rejoice in the virtues of all, I request the wheel of the Dharma,🔽I beseech the one who is like the full moon to remain

analyzed: da sha da lo nga la la  ba  'o te   zhe sa'i skye zla ku zla ba lnga la ba

original: tu dka' ba'i lam du 'khrid la bskyod pa ba sogs ba pal lo ka dag la blo kha gong 'khas pa tshhig tu/_nyen kha dpal
analyzed: tu dka' ba'i lam du 'khrid la bskyod pa ba sogs ba pal lo ka dag la blo kha gong 'khas pa tshhig tu/_nyen kha dpal

original: pa ba kyi
analyzed: pa ba kyi
